channel.title: unity on Emilio Blacksmith Blog
channel.description: Recent content in unity on Emilio Blacksmith Blog

item.title: Goodbye Unity Engine
item.description: Dear Unity Unity is a game engine that I’ve used in the past, and I’m willing to say was my dear tool to make most of my ideas a reality in the gamedev world, I created my first videogame with it, and it is allocated in a very special place in my heart, I started using this game engine since 2014, not full time obviously, but it was absolutely a game changer.
